cause.description:
This epidemic MUST be stopped. Too many innocent lives have already been lost. Drunk driving doesn't discriminate against race, age, religion, ethnicity, gender, sexual orientation, or class. IT AFFECTS EVERYONE! Please join the cause and invite all your friends. By working together, we can SAVE lives!
1. Stiffer penalties for drunk drivers
2. National designated driver program
3. More funding for drunk driving education and awareness programs
cause.mission: Get the message out... Drunk driving is NEVER acceptable!
cause.name: Crash Drunk Driving
